#sidebar Sidebar

== _abstract class_ !aCssParserPlugin ==
This class is the abstract definition of a parser plugin. Every parser plugin have to implement this class.
----

=== Properties ===
==== _protected_ `string` $buffer = "" ====
The plugin buffer.
----

==== _protected_ `array` $configuration = array() ====
The plugin configuration.
----

==== _protected_ [ApiParserCssParser CssParser] $parser = null ====
Instance of the [ApiParserCssParser CssParser] of the plugin.
----

=== Methods ===
==== `void` _public_ __construct([ApiParserCssParser CssParser] $parser, `array` $configuration = array()) ====
Constructor setting the instance of [ApiParserCssParser CssParser] and the plugin configuration.
 * [ApiParserCssParser CssParser] $parser : Instance of the [ApiMinifierCssMinifier CssMinifier]
 * `array` $configuration : Plugin configuration (optional)
 * *Returns:* `void`
----

==== `array` _public_ getTriggerChars() ====
Returns an array of chars the plugin have to get called on. This avoids unnessasary calls to the plugin.
 * *Returns:* `array`
----

==== `array` _public_ getTriggerStates() ====
Returns an array of parser states the plugin have to get called on. This avoids unnessasary calls to the plugin.
 * *Returns:* `array`
----

==== `void` _public_ parse(`integer` $index, `string` $char, `string` $previousChar, `string` $state) ====
This method implements the call to the parser.
 * `integer` $index : Current parser index
 * `string` $char : Current char
 * `string` $previousChar : Previous char
 * `string` $state : Current parser state
 * *Returns:* `void`
----
